attributes.action: not give the killers of baby p new identities INCLUDING THE MOTHER.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I DONT BELIEVE THEY SHOULD BE GIVEN NEW IDENTITIES FOR WHAT THEY HAVE DONE. YOU SHOULD SIGN THIS PETITION THE FACTS ARE THERE TO SEE. JUST SIGN PLS.. ITS JUST NOT RIGHT.

rejection.details:
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
Your petition is duplicated here http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/A-New-Identity/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
